ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: EC50; Species: Dreissena polymorpha (Zebra Mussel) shell length 5-8 mm; Conditions: freshwater, static, 17.0 °C (16.3-17.4 °C), pH 8.0 (7.3-8.7), hardness 146 mg/L CaCO3 (136-156 mg/L CaCO3), alkalinity 109 mg/L CaCO3 (98-120 mg/L CaCO3), dissolved oxygen 8.3 mg/L (6.0-11.2 mg/L); Concentration: 17800 ug/L for 48 hr (95% confidence interval: 11700-23800 ug/L); Effect: behavior, increased ability to detach from substrate /formulation/
